master.poller

Class USPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • master.poller.Poller
        • master.poller.USPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class USPoller
extends Poller
    USPoller takes an Ultrasonic Sensor and defines how information is polled from the sensor.
    Since:
    2016-11-02
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Marfleet
